info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 12 at 10:52PM MDT until August 13 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of western Texas, including the following county, El Paso.
* WHEN...Until 1245 AM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1052 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall of up to 0.5 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... Clint, Horizon City, Fabens, San Elizario, Socorro, Colonia del Paso, Dairyland, Agua Dulce and Lake Way Estates. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM MDT WEDNESDAY
